about.title: About
about.subtitle: Get to know me
about.content: Student specialized in Computer Networks and Telecommunications, I am also a Full Stack Developer. My training allows me to master both the design and security of complex network infrastructures, as well as the development of modern and high-performance web applications. I combine these two areas of expertise to create complete solutions, blending network robustness with development excellence.
